msg.ridm.tooltip.sparkler: §r§7The Sparkler is a classic semi-firework carried around to celebrate Independence Day! Everybody likes some good sparkler fun!§r
msg.ridm.tooltip.redwaterbln: §r§7A water balloon! A classic way to prank your friends, and great during the summer! This one is colored red.
msg.ridm.tooltip.blackwaterbln: §r§7A water balloon! A classic way to prank your friends, and great during the summer! This one is colored black.
msg.ridm.tooltip.watermelon: §r§7A watermelon is a classic treat during summer and should be enjoyed here too!
